properties.Name: DistributorshipAgreement

Columns.Name: ContractId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Contract.

Columns.Name: AgreementDate
Columns.Description: The date that the agreement is to become effective.

Columns.Name: RightsGrantedSection
Columns.Description:
This section establishes the basic relationship between the parties essentially:

-  The manufacturer appoints the distributor to distribute manufacturer's products in a predefined geographic area

-  Manufacturer will not authorize other distributors to distribute products in that same geographic area.

Columns.Name: SalesTermsSection
Columns.Description:
This section establishes pricing and shipping terms for the distributor relationship.

(1)  That the manufacturer will set prices 

(2)  It may be specified that some advance notice of pricing changes will be given to the distributor

(3)  It is established who will pay for shipping from the manufacturer location and what the liabilities for damage or loss shall be to each party

Columns.Name: PaymentSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes how payment by distributor to manufacturer shall be made, within what timeframe and defines any penalties for late payment.

Columns.Name: MarketingPoliciesSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes how marketing will be pursue and maintained by the distributor in terms of adequate inventory, dealer selection and sales procedures.

Columns.Name: DistributorDutiesSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes obligations of the distributor to the manufacturer such as support services, marketing competing products, maintaining a display facility and training of sales personnel.

Columns.Name: SalesAndMerchandisingPoliciesSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes sales quotas, promotions, advertising and other issues related to sales of the products.

Columns.Name: AdvertisingPoliciesSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes the responsibilities of each party related to advertising of the products.

Columns.Name: ProductWarrantySection
Columns.Description: This section establishes how defective products will be returned, adjustments made, replacement products provided, shipping costs handled and similar issues.

Columns.Name: IndemnificationSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes how each party is responsible in case claims are made by third parties in the course of the agreement.

Columns.Name: OrderProcessingSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes how each party will fulfill orders.

Columns.Name: ReturnsPolicySection
Columns.Description: This section establishes how returns by customers to distributor and distributor to manufacturer will be handled, prices adjusted, shipping reimbursed and similar issues.

Columns.Name: FinancialPoliciesSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes how distributor will pay manufacturer, in what time frame, what financial statements will be exchanges or available for inspection by the other party and how accounts will be reconciled.

Columns.Name: UseOfManufacturersNameSection
Columns.Description: This section governs the use by the distributor of the manufacturer's name during and after the period of the agreement.

Columns.Name: RelationshipOfPartiesSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes the true relationship between the distributor and manufacturer.

Columns.Name: TermAndTerminationSection
Columns.Description:
This section establishes the starting date and ending date for the distributor agreement.

This section also establishes the terms under which the agreement can be terminated prior to the ending date.

Columns.Name: AgreementStartDate
Columns.Description: The starting date of the agreement.

Columns.Name: AgreementEndDate
Columns.Description: The ending date of the agreement.

Columns.Name: FinalAgreementSection
Columns.Description:
This section makes it clear that this is the final agreement between parties and replaces or supersedes any prior discussions or agreements.    
Any amendments to this agreement must be made in writing.

Columns.Name: TerminationObligationsSection
Columns.Description: This section establishes the distributors obligations when the agreement is terminated.

Columns.Name: AcknowledgementsSection
Columns.Description: This section states that each party accepts the terms of the agreement and that no promise or commitment was made by either party outside of the agreement.

Columns.Name: AssignmentSection
Columns.Description: This section forbids the distributor from assigning its interest or obligation to any third parties.
